attributes.action: Ban the selling, distribution and use of all disposable electronic cigarettes.
attributes.additional_details: There are no positive outcomes when it comes to disposable electronic cigarettes. Primarily, they are obismal for the environment and a key element in slowing down the rehabilitation for a greener planet. They are also damaging for people health which is never a positive result but also means there’s even more pressure on the health service. Finally they have now become a trend in which children and young adults have been heavily influenced by and in which needs to come to a prompt conclusion.
attributes.background: I want the permanent ban of all uses, selling and distributions of disposable electronic cigarettes country wide in all large retailers at the bare minimum.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612333
